dialog.text: Ended up contacting Douglas on Slack this morning and we looked through some of my work together.  Looks like I wasn't as bad as Tanya was making out but have a lot to do if I am going to pass this semester.  Any progress with your latest project?
Have decided to clear the air with Tanya, wish me luck!  If that doesn't work I'm going to ask one of the lecturers for help.  Is that the time - need to go.  Sorry!
